Header: OCDC Does its Share for ‘Thuru Mithuru Nawa Ratak’
Content: Officer Career Development Centre (OCDC) at Buttala in compliance with the ongoing ‘Thuru Mithuru Nawa Ratak’ of the Army lent their assistance by planting 100 saplings of special varieties in the OCDC premises on Monday (6). Intending to turn the OCDC to look more greener and attractive, troops serving the OCDC planted those saplings inside the compound with 500 m in distance to each other. Major General Jayanath Jayaweera, Commandant, OCDC, Deputy Commandant, Chief Instructor, Commanding Officer, Senior Instructors, Officers and Other Ranks took part in the programme by planting those saplings.
